entry.title: Combined summary - Bitcoin API Wrapper
entry.summary: Krzysztof has created a C++ wrapper for JSON-RPC communication with an existing Bitcoin installation. This wrapper can be helpful for developers interested in building extensions or similar projects. Krzysztof shared the code for the wrapper on GitHub, where it is available for anyone to use at https://github.com/minium/bitcoin-api-cpp.In his message, Krzysztof encourages other developers to take advantage of his project and utilize it in their own work. By using this wrapper for JSON-RPC communication, developers can simplify their coding process and streamline their projects. Overall, Krzysztof's creation of a C++ wrapper for JSON-RPC communication with Bitcoin installation has the potential to greatly benefit the development community. With easy access to the code on GitHub, more developers will have the opportunity to use and build upon Krzysztof's work.
